title: 820-00165 with all power rails but no POST
message: This 2015 Air board generates all power rails, Vcore, ALL_SYS_PWRGD, and PM_SLP_S4_L. Fan spins but does not POST, chime, or start up. The only abnormal signals I noticed are SMC_PROCHOT = 3.4 and CPU_PROCHOT_L = 0. Any ideas?

title: 820-00165 with all power rails but no POST
message:
What about PLT_RESET_L?
Any history fault?

title: 820-00165 with all power rails but no POST
message: PLT_RESET_L is 3.3 V. I have no history on the machine.

title: 820-00165 with all power rails but no POST
820-00165 with all power rails but no POST
message: Tried a known good BIOS chip (clean ME region). No improvement. Fan spins, then stops, then continues spinning without POST.

title: 820-00165 with all power rails but no POST
message:
Check all SPI Bus Series Termination resistors and their traces.
Inspect board for corrosion.
Check it outside of shell, only charger and USB device for test.
Do not connect LIO flex, nor SSD and airport card.

title: 820-00165 with all power rails but no POST
message: Close inspection revealed a tiny speck of corrosion on one corner of the SMC. Anything I can do to the SMC that doesn't involve replacing or reballing it?

title: 820-00165 with all power rails but no POST
message:
Reball is necessary, always when corrosion is detected close.
You can try reflow, may just help temporary; just to detect the issue.

title: 820-00165 with all power rails but no POST
message: Ok, I did a reflow with flux and the board starts up and works now. Will test long-term to see if the issue is fixed.
